about_the_game:
Fischer's Fishing Journey takes you to a planet where humanity has long since vanished. Join Fischer, the adventurous little cat, as you travel to stunning locations across the planet and enjoy tranquil fishing moments! Sell your catches or display them in your fish tank to earn Fish Coins, which can be used to buy bait, upgrade fishing rods, expand your tank, and unlock new locations and fascinating fish species! Along the journey, chat with friends, fulfill their wishes, and uncover the history of this unique world.

  • Dynamic Landscapes: Explore multiple scenic locations with dynamic weather and time-of-day changes, immersing you in varied and serene environments.

  • Idle Fishing Fun: Let Fischer handle the fishing for you! Just check in occasionally to adjust bait and collect your catches—perfect for a relaxing gameplay experience.

  • Fish Collection: Discover dozens of unique and quirky fish species, each tied to specific locations, times, weather conditions, and bait types.

  • Tank Management: Showcase your catches in your fish tank for extra income and enjoy the vibrant underwater view.

  • Casual Mini-Games: Want to lend a paw? Play casual mini-games at special times to boost your fishing efficiency!

  • Story Exploration: Talk to companions to learn their tales and uncover the history of this mysterious planet.

  • Multiple window modes: You can set the game as your wallpaper or place the cat in a corner of your desktop!

Fischer's Fishing Journey takes you to a planet where humanity has long since vanished. Join Fischer, the adventurous little cat, as you travel to stunning locations across the planet and enjoy tranquil fishing moments! Sell your catches or display them in your fish tank to earn Fish Coins, which can be used to buy bait, upgrade fishing rods, expand your tank, and unlock new locations and fascinating fish species! Along the journey, chat with friends, fulfill their wishes, and uncover the history of this unique world.

  • Dynamic Landscapes: Explore multiple scenic locations with dynamic weather and time-of-day changes, immersing you in varied and serene environments.

  • Idle Fishing Fun: Let Fischer handle the fishing for you! Just check in occasionally to adjust bait and collect your catches—perfect for a relaxing gameplay experience.

  • Fish Collection: Discover dozens of unique and quirky fish species, each tied to specific locations, times, weather conditions, and bait types.

  • Tank Management: Showcase your catches in your fish tank for extra income and enjoy the vibrant underwater view.

  • Casual Mini-Games: Want to lend a paw? Play casual mini-games at special times to boost your fishing efficiency!

name: Fischer's Fishing Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fischer's Fishing Journey is a relaxing idle fishing game that you can even play as wallpaper. Join Fischer the cat in enjoying peaceful fishing moments as time and weather change around you. Collect unique fish to display in your fish tank. Meet charming animal friends and listen to their stories.
